node.statement: FINITE FREE CUMULANT REPRESENTATION: The MSS convolution satisfies kappa_k^{(n)}(p âŠž_n q) = kappa_k^{(n)}(p) + kappa_k^{(n)}(q) where the finite free cumulants kappa_k^{(n)} are defined by kappa_k^{(n)}(p) = (n!/(n-k)!) * e_k(lambda)/C(n,k) with e_k the elementary symmetric polynomials (up to normalization). Express Phi_n(p) as a function of the finite free cumulants kappa_1^{(n)},...,kappa_n^{(n)}(p). The additivity of cumulants under convolution then constrains Phi_n(r).
